job_description:
NEW ROLE - AWS DATA ENGINEER - INSURANCE - PERM
London based with a Hybrid working culture in place.
£60,000-£80,000 BONUS AND BENS
Key Responsibilities:
Build and support new AWS native cloud data products
Mentoring of team members through code reviews and pair programming
Deliver data to presentation layers to power reporting and analytics across our global organization
Collaborate with stakeholders, product owners, and developers to ensure alignment between requirements and data solutions.
Skills and Experience:
Extensive experience in AWS services, e.g. EC2, S3, RDS, DynamoDB, Redshift, Lambda, API Gateway
Strong SQL skills for complex data queries and transformations
Typescript, Python programming for data processing and analysis
Carbon60, Lorien & SRG - The Impellam Group STEM Portfolio are acting as an Employment Business in relation to this vacancy.
